Reflection-Studio.description:
This one started pretty straightforward.
I was looking for studio lights online late at night because I wanted to photograph something Iâ€™d been working on. When I came back into my room after grabbing something to eat I noticed how my tv screen was lighting up almost my entire room.
So i decide to flip the screen horizontally and started experimenting with the light that shone down on the little studio i had built.
